Dwarven:
I can impose auxiliary spell. But only for those who have not yet reached the 91 level.
Available effects: Poem Horn / Drum Poem / Poem AuthorityPoem Guitar / Harp Poem / Poem LutesBattle Sonata / Sonata MovementSonata Relaxation.
You can also get one of the following effects to choose from: Harmony Guard / Berserker / Mage. Choose faster!
